Labs.title: Group Portfolio
Labs.description: This lab will have you create a portfolio website for your group, which will include a portfolio site/page for each individual member of the group within.

Labs.title: Constitution App
Labs.description: Each group will make their own interactive Constitution web app/site.

Labs.title: ITWS Site
Labs.description: Have you seen the ITWS web page? It’s not very good… https://science.rpi.edu/itws/ Your job this week (as individuals, this is not a group lab) is to make us a new site

Labs.title: GNH Site
Labs.description: This is not a drill: you have gotten your very first commission to create a website for a real client! The client is Gamma Nu Eta, the ITWS Honors Society. They have an immediate need for a new website, and they’ve agreed to let you make it!

Labs.title: Front End Optimization
Labs.description: We are going to optimize a game I made called Free Bee game as found at https://freebee.fun/play/

Labs.title: Php Calculator
Labs.description: Your (individual) lab is to recreate this calculator that recreates mathematical functions.

Labs.title: PhpMyAdmin Gradebook
Labs.description: Create an interactive web page (using HTML/CSS/JS/PHP) that allows the user to do all the steps in part 2 through a web interface. Basically, make me a grade book for class :)

Labs.title: Front and Back End
Labs.description: Web Application including front and back end for WebSystems Course Data
